snippet: The fashion designer celebrated the new book “Gloss: The Work of Chris von Wangenheim” with a strict (and literal) “dress to kill” dress code.
lead_paragraph: The fashion designer celebrated the new book “Gloss: The Work of Chris von Wangenheim” with a strict (and literal) “dress to kill” dress code.

headline.main: Marc Jacobs Hosted a Heck of a Party Last Night
